title: I Want to Have This and That
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>*Sigh*.... I want to be able to properly get up in the morning. Rina-chan, are you a morning person? I’m really bad in the mornings….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m bad too. But…. I made a device that helps me wake up early…. So I’m fine now<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh!? What!? You made something like that, Rina-chan!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. Do you want one, Honoka-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Umm…. Actually, can you make other…. useful stuff like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hmm…. What kind of thing do you want?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>First is of course, the device that helps me wake up in the morning, then a device that can brush my teeth while I tie up my hair, a device that can pack my textbooks into my bag while I eat breakfast, and then a device that can tell if Umi-chan is angry<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay. I’ll try to figure it out<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yaaay----! With this I’ll have a bright high school life---!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>But, using new inventions…. comes with their own risk. Are you…. prepared to take them, Honoka-san….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
